onboardD1: Discover new possibilities with our app.
onboardD2: Keep in touch with your beloved ones.
loginDescription: Use your mobile number to login
pwdRequestDescription: We will reset your password using your mobile number.
pwdVerifyTitle: Enter the OTP to reset your password
pwdVerifyDescription: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your mobile number.
pwdResetDescription: Enter your new passwords to reset your password.
pwdSuccessDescription:
You successfully reset your password.
Go back to Login again.
signupRequestDescription: Enter your mobile number to receive an OTP.
signupVerifyDescription: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your mobile number.
signupDescription: Enter your email and password to complete the registration.
signupHint: By clicking on Signup, you agree to
signupSuccessDescription: You successfully created your account. Create a wallet PIN to keep your account secure.
createPinDescription:
Create a SECURE PIN to keep your e-wallet and
transaction safe from any unauthorized access.
pinSuccessDescription: You're all signed up. Let's secure your account by verifying your IDENTITY
ekycStartTitle: Time to confirm it's really you
ekycStartDescription: Hey there! To use our app as per BNM requirements, we just need to make sure it's really you.
ekycSuccessDescription: We verifying your identity. Once that's done, we'll shoot you a notification. It usually takes about 1 to 3 working days.
ekycGuideDescription: Hey, as a regulated institution, we just need to double-check your identity.
ekycGuide2Description: Snap a photo of your ID or Passport
ekycGuide4Description: Please take a selfie for ID verification
ekycChooseTypeDescription: Let's pick the document type for verification.
otpSent: OTP sent to your mobile number successfully.
